data.title: Andalusia Hospital
images: https://my1healthstorage.blob.core.windows.net/my1health/medical_treatments/Because Your Well-being Matters Most to us-andalusia-hospital.jpg
data.meta_description: Experience top-tier, personalised healthcare at Andalusia Hospital, Cairo. A patient-centric, multispecialty facility setting global standards. Contact us Today!
data.text:
Specialties offered at Andalusia Hospital

Explore Andalusia Hospital, where advanced specialized care meets compassion. From Cardiovascular Excellence to Fertility Solutions, our skilled team ensures your well-being through innovation and personalized attention. Experience a holistic approach to health at its finest.

Orthopaedics and Trauma Leading orthopaedic care for trauma recovery, joint replacement, and sports injuries. Book now via WhatsApp

Gastroenterology Leading-edge gastroenterology treatments and procedures for digestive disorders. Book now via WhatsApp

Oncology/Cancer Treatment Personalised cancer treatment options, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery. Book now via WhatsApp

General Surgery Advanced surgical procedures with a holistic patient-centred approach. Book now via WhatsApp

Cardiology Premier cardiac care with interventional cardiology, echocardiography, and electrophysiology. Book now via WhatsApp

Organ Transplant Holistic transplant solutions for various organs. Book now via WhatsApp

IVF & Fertility Treatment State-of-the-art fertility solutions with IVF, ICSI, and ART, guiding you towards parenthood. Book now via WhatsApp

Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery Expert surgical interventions for heart, lung, and vascular systems using latest technology. Book now via WhatsApp

Colon and Rectal Surgery Minimally invasive surgeries and innovative treatments for colorectal conditions Book now via WhatsApp

Dentistry Cosmetic, restorative, and preventive dental care that ensures your smile's health and beauty. Book now via WhatsApp

Dermatology Advanced dermatological care for skin, hair, and nails, using latest skin therapy and cosmetic dermatology Book now via WhatsApp

Ear, Nose and Throat (ENT)/ Otolaryngology Comprehensive otolaryngology services for hearing, balance, and sinus health. Book now via WhatsApp

Endocrinology/Diabetes Expert diabetes management and hormonal disorders with personalised endocrine care. Book now via WhatsApp

Haematology Expert haematological care for blood diseases, life-saving bone marrow transplants. Book now via WhatsApp

Medical Genetics Personalised genetic counselling and testing services to guide your health decisions. Book now via WhatsApp

Nephrology Comprehensive nephrology services, including dialysis and kidney transplant Book now via WhatsApp

Neurology/Neurosurgery Integrated neurology and neurosurgery services for brain and spine health. Book now via WhatsApp

Obstetrics and Gynaecology Full-range obstetric and gynaecological care for women at all stages of life. Book now via WhatsApp

Ophthalmology Advanced ophthalmic treatments for vision correction, cataract surgery, and glaucoma management. Book now via WhatsApp

Paediatrics/Neonatology Specialised paediatric and neonatal care for the youngest patients, from infancy through adolescence. Book now via WhatsApp

Pathology State-of-the-art pathology services providing accurate diagnoses and insights. Book now via WhatsApp

Physiotherapy and Rehabilitation Services Personalised rehabilitation programs and physiotherapy to regain strength and mobility. Book now via WhatsApp

Plastic/Reconstructive surgery Aesthetic and reconstructive plastic surgery services to enhance appearance and function. Book now via WhatsApp

Psychiatry Comprehensive psychiatric services for mental health, from therapy to medication management. Book now via WhatsApp

Psychology Tailored therapeutic approaches for mental well-being and emotional health. Book now via WhatsApp

Pulmonology/Pneumology Advanced pulmonology services for lung health, including asthma and COPD management. Book now via WhatsApp

Radiology Cutting-edge radiological services for precise diagnosis and guided interventions. Book now via WhatsApp

Rheumatology Specialised rheumatology treatments for arthritis and autoimmune conditions. Book now via WhatsApp

Urology Comprehensive urology services for urinary disorders and men's health. Book now via WhatsApp

Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Aesthetic and reconstructive plastic surgery services to enhance appearance and function. Book now via WhatsApp

Health check-ups Preventative care services focused on maintaining health and preventing disease. Book now via WhatsApp

Anaesthesiology - Pain/Palliative Medicine Advanced pain management and palliative care for comprehensive support and comfort. Book now via WhatsApp

World-Class Healthcare, Tailored Just for You

Andalusia Hospital, a renowned healthcare facility, combines 40 years of expertise in facilities across Egypt and Saudi Arabia. With 12 state-of-the-art specialty centres, we provide world-class specialised treatments ensuring the best possible outcomes.

As a leading destination for medical tourism in Egypt, Andalusia Hospital delivers high-standard medical services, advanced facilities, and a team of renowned specialists dedicated to international patients seeking exceptional treatment.

At Andalusia Hospital, Egypt, we excel in specialised medical services, including Cardiology, Neurosurgery, and Orthopaedics, utilising cutting-edge technology and a team of experienced professionals tailored to your unique needs.

Disclaimer

My 1Health is a Medical Tourism Facilitator and does not provide direct treatment advice. We connect you with top-quality, licensed hospitals. Any treatment plans come solely from licensed doctors at our partner hospitals. My 1Health holds no liability for advice given by third-party licensed doctors or hospitals. We strongly recommend consulting your local doctor to discuss treatment options provided through our platform.
